question:
You have just spent a weekend at a friend's house.when you returned home. You discovered you have left a coat containing some belongings in his house.
Write a letter to your friend telling him that you left the coat.
Tell him what the coat looks like , where you think you left it and what was inside it.
Make some suggestions about how to get it back.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health.I am writing this letter to concern with my coat forgotten at your home on weekend. I know there was a cold and after some times the cold was gone away, which suddenly transformed into scolding weather that is why I removed my coat. Also, we had enjoyed ourselves  a lot  with witty jocks and playing games.

In this weather changed situation, we all are put off our coats at one side, I vividly remember that I placed my coat in the big room in your house. Moreover, the coat colour is back with white lines, which is made of cotton cloth and approve 3 feet long up to kneel.I remember that was put on a hanger behind the door in a large room.I wish you easily find out.

I am forced to you searching my coat because inside the coat pocket I have placed stupendous documents list which I would have submitted my project manager  before this Monday.one you find the coat please call me, so I make some arrangement to someone collect my coat maybe my uncle collected because he is living your area , another way if I early free at  my work,I will collect.
See you soon  next weekend at my home!

error_list.error_des: It seems that times may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
